mil7.2.9:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena āsaṅkitaparisaṅkitena yattapayattena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā saṁvutehi indriyehi caritabbaṁ.
mil7.2.9:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyasassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.2.9:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, vāyaso yaṁ kiñci bhojanaṁ disvā ñātīhi saṁvibhajitvā bhuñjati;
mil7.2.9:2.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi,
mil7.2.9:2.2_2: tathārūpehi lābhehi paṭivibhattabhoginā bhavitabbaṁ sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi.
mil7.2.9:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyasassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
